thread.title: Walmart, MartJack, MobiKwik, iEnergizer join hands for cutting edge mobile solutions
thread.title_full: Walmart, MartJack, MobiKwik, iEnergizer join hands for cutting edge mobile solutions | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Walmart, MartJack, MobiKwik, iEnergizer join hands for cutting edge mobile solutions
text:
Walmart India in partnership with MobiKwik has launched two cutting-edge mobile solutions, `Best Price’ Mobile App and ‘Dial-a-Deal’ IVR system for its members across all 20 Best Price Modern Wholesale stores in nine states.
The ‘Best Price’ Mobile App has been developed for members to browse, select and place orders, all from their android smart phones.
MartJack Enterprise, an e-commerce solutions provider has developed the app.
A release issued here today claimed that for digital and mobile commerce, Walmart India has exclusively partnered with MobiKwik, India’s largest independent mobile payments network, to offer Best Price members a safe, fast and easy way to pay.
Scott Price, President and CEO, Walmart Asia, said “Our new mobile app will give Best Price members a personalized and seamless shopping experience.”
Dial-a-Deal is an IVR system aimed at small enterprises to enable them to get information about best deals available in Best Price stores.
Walmart India has tied up with iEnergizer for customizing the infrastructure. Bipin Preet Singh, Founder &CEO, MobiKwik said,”With this partnership, together Walmart India and MobiKwik are bringing the power of mobile payments to lakhs of small businesses and kirana stores in India.
Members will also be able to load cash into their MobiKwikWallets to make purchases via the Best Pricemobile app.”
Abhay Deshpande, Founder and CEO, MartJack Enterprise said, “Walmart India’s Mobile App launch heralds a new wave in Indian B2B eCommerce industry.”
Adarsh Agarwal, COO of iEnergizer said, “Together, Walmart India and iEnergizer have conceptualized use of cutting edge technology to co-create ‘Dial-a-deal’ concept.”
 04, 2015 7:24 pm
